text: , often abbreviated as Sega AM R&D; No. 2 or Sega AM2 and known as , is a video game development division of the Japanese company Sega. It was founded by Yu Suzuki in 1985. Sega AM2 is best known for the Hang On, Out Run, Virtua Fighter, Daytona USA and Shenmue series. AM2's first 3D game was Virtua Racing. It was published in 1992. It was followed by Virtua Fighter and Daytona USA. ==Notes== ==References== Category:Sega divisions and subsidiaries
title: Sega AM2
